Name: Nova Odessa
About the game: You need a job, so what do you do? Obviously, you start working as a demon hunter! Explore the city of Nova Odessa and kill lots of demons! Nova Odessa is a action/adventure game where you play as a novice demon hunter. Fast-paced combat! Find new equipment and upgrades! 8 different areas with unique bosses! Customize your home! Become financially independent!
